title: Climate change fuelled cyclone Chido’s destructive power – Scientists
description: Climate change intensified Cyclone Chido as it barrelled toward the Indian Ocean archipelago of Mayotte, according to a preliminary study by scientists studying the link between global warming and tropical storms. The assessment by Imperial College London als…
content: Climate change intensified Cyclone Chido as it barrelled toward the Indian Ocean archipelago of Mayotte, according to a preliminary study by scientists studying the link between global warming and tr… [+2054 chars]
de: Der Klimawandel verstärkte die zerstörerische Kraft des Zyklons Chido – Wissenschaftler. Laut einer vorläufigen Studie von Wissenschaftlern, die den Zusammenhang zwischen globaler Erwärmung und tropischen Stürmen untersuchten, verstärkte der Klimawandel den Zyklon Chido, als er auf die Inselgruppe Mayotte im Indischen Ozean zuraste. Die Einschätzung des Imperial College London auch…
en: Climate change fuelled cyclone Chido’s destructive power – Scientists. Climate change intensified Cyclone Chido as it barrelled toward the Indian Ocean archipelago of Mayotte, according to a preliminary study by scientists studying the link between global warming and tropical storms. The assessment by Imperial College London als…
la: Clima mutatio fueled cyclonis Chidonis potentia perniciosa est – Scientists. Mutatio climatis intensa Cyclone Chido ad Oceanum Indicum Archipelago Mayotte cadens est, secundum praevium studium a phisicis nexum inter calefactionem globalem et procellas tropicas discentibus. Taxatio Collegii Imperialis London als.

title: Climate, migration and conflict mix to create ‘deadly’ intense tropical storms like Chido
description: The ongoing conflict and terrorist violence, coupled with cyclones like Kenneth in 2019, has caused repeated evacuations and worsening living conditions.
content: Cyclone Chido was an “intense tropical cyclone”, equivalent to a category 4 hurricane in the Atlantic. It made landfall in Mayotte, a small island lying to the north-west of Madagascar on December 14… [+6276 chars]
de: Klima, Migration und Konflikte vermischen sich und führen zu „tödlichen“ intensiven tropischen Stürmen wie Chido. Der anhaltende Konflikt und die terroristische Gewalt sowie Wirbelstürme wie Kenneth im Jahr 2019 haben zu wiederholten Evakuierungen und einer Verschlechterung der Lebensbedingungen geführt.
en: Climate, migration and conflict mix to create ‘deadly’ intense tropical storms like Chido. The ongoing conflict and terrorist violence, coupled with cyclones like Kenneth in 2019, has caused repeated evacuations and worsening living conditions.
la: Clima, migratio et conflictus miscent ad creandum vehementiores procellas tropicae mortiferae sicut Chido. Certamen perpetuum et violentia terrorista, cyclonibus sicut Kenneth anno 2019 iuncta, iteratas evacuationes effecit et condiciones vitae ingravescens.

title: What happens in the ocean when two cyclones collide?
description: In April 2021, two tropical cyclones, Seroja and Odette, collided in the Indian Ocean northwest of Australia. Two researchers from the University of Oldenburg have now studied how this rare phenomenon affected the ocean.
content: In April 2021, two tropical cyclones, Seroja and Odette, collided in the Indian Ocean northwest of Australia. Two researchers from the University of Oldenburg have now studied how this rare phenomeno… [+6233 chars]
de: Was passiert im Ozean, wenn zwei Wirbelstürme kollidieren? Im April 2021 kollidierten zwei tropische Wirbelstürme, Seroja und Odette, im Indischen Ozean nordwestlich von Australien. Zwei Forscher der Universität Oldenburg haben nun untersucht, wie sich dieses seltene Phänomen auf den Ozean auswirkt.
en: What happens in the ocean when two cyclones collide?. In April 2021, two tropical cyclones, Seroja and Odette, collided in the Indian Ocean northwest of Australia. Two researchers from the University of Oldenburg have now studied how this rare phenomenon affected the ocean.
la: Quid in Oceano accidit, cum duae cyclones colliduntur? Mense Aprili 2021 duae cyclones tropicae, Seroja et Odette, in Oceano Indico inter septentrionem et occidentem Australiae conflixerunt. Duo investigatores ex Universitate Oldenburgensibus nunc studuerunt quomodo hoc rarum phaenomenon Oceanum moveat.

title: At least 11 dead in French territory of Mayotte as Cyclone Chido causes devastating damage
description: The tropical cyclone blew through the southeastern Indian Ocean, also affecting the nearby islands of Comoros and Madagascar.
content:
At least 11 people have died after Cyclone Chido caused devastating damage in the French territory of Mayotte in the Indian Ocean, Frances Interior Ministry said Sunday.
The ministry said it was pro… [+2264 chars]
de: Mindestens 11 Tote im französischen Territorium Mayotte, als Zyklon Chido verheerende Schäden anrichtete. The tropical cyclone blew through the southeastern Indian Ocean, also affecting the nearby islands of Comoros and Madagascar.
en: At least 11 dead in French territory of Mayotte as Cyclone Chido causes devastating damage. The tropical cyclone blew through the southeastern Indian Ocean, also affecting the nearby islands of Comoros and Madagascar.
la: Saltem 11 mortui sunt in territorio Gallico Mayotte sicut Cyclone Chido damnum vastat. Cyclonus tropicus per Oceanum meridianum Indicum flavit, etiam insulas Comoros et Madagascar vicinas afficiens.

title: Thousands Feared Dead in Impoverished French Territory of Mayotte After Cyclone Chido
